She is always so eager to learn better ways of going about dairy farming. However, she says expensive farm inputs are increasingly becoming a major challenge for dairy farmers in Kericho.  

Recently, Joan and a group of farmers from her area were trained on how to farm poultry. Before the training, most of the attendees kept poultry for subsistence. After the training, they realized farming poultry is not the chicken business, and Joan sees a lot of potential in this sector. However, she lacks capital to get started, so she is seeking a loan to purchase poultry. 

With your lending, Joan will get an additional income stream. Also, with the money from her egg sales, she seeks to fully repay her loan on time. Once the loan is cleared, she will channel the extra money to cover her family-related expenses. All Joan ever wants is to have a better life for tomorrow.

loans.use: to purchase poultry.

loans.name: Merly Maritza

texts.es: Merly esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio de venta de ropa como polos, chompas, pantalones, casacas, entre otro con lo cual podrá atender los pedidos de sus clientes, mejorar sus ventas y poder seguir trabajando por salir adelante ya que este humilde negocio es su única fuente de ingresos para poder progresar y apoyaer a su familia, la cual conforma al lado de su hijo de 2 años.
texts.en:
Merly is grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to the help they have given her, she will be able to buy merchandise such as polo shirts, sweaters, pants, and dress jackets (among other items) for her clothing sales business.  With this merchandise she will be able to take care of her customers’ orders, improve her sales, and keep working to get ahead.  

Her modest business is her only source of income to be able to make progress and support her family, which includes her two-year-old child.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as polo shirts, sweaters, pants, dress coats, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rabbits

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan sells charcoal in Hoima, Uganda. She does farming alongside her charcoal business. 

Joan is a widow with three children and is charged with the responsibility of taking care of her family. Three attend school. She started this business so as to educate her children. She intends to expand her business. However, limited capital and high transportation costs hinder her business.

Joan will use the loan to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Kadzo

texts.en:
Kadzo is a married woman who has been blessed with three school-going children. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Kadzo has operated a charcoal selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and villagers. Her greatest monthly challenge is the high cost of transportation.

Kadzo is requesting a loan to purchase charcoal for resale. She joined Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Marina Marcia

texts.es:
La pared de madera de la pulpería de Marina de 66 años, adornan de forma rustica su negocio que inicio hace 8 años, junto a su taller de costura. Esta madre multifacética, no deja que los años interrumpan su espíritu emprendedor, pues a pesar de no haber llegado a sus estudios de secundaria, supo salir adelante con sus 6 hijos, que ahora todos son independientes. 
Cada bolsa de algodón, cada botella de jugo o de gaseosa, adornan no solo el negocio, sino la vida de esta mujer trabajadora, que con unos pequeños ahorro logro invertir  para comprar mercadería  para su pulpería. Ahora no solo necesita para comprar papel higiénico, arroz, frijoles o cajas de fósforos para su pulpería sino que también para invertir en su taller de costura es por eso que solicita un préstamo para comprar telas, hilos y agujas, y así entregar un producto de calidad. Al cancelar este préstamo, piensa seguir solicitando créditos para poder suplir las necesidades de financiamiento y así cumplir con sus planes establecidos para su negocio y para su familia.
texts.en:
The wooden walls of 66-year-old Marina's grocery store give a rustic feel to the business that she started alongside her dressmaking workshop eight years ago. This multi-talented mother does not let her age limit her enterprising spirit. In spite of not having gone to high school, Marina knew how to prosper with her six children, all of whom are now independent.

Every bag of cotton, every bottle of juice or soda does not adorn just the business, but also hard-working Marina's life. With some savings she managed to invest and buy merchandise for her grocery store. She now needs capital not just to buy toilet paper, rice, beans and matches for her grocery store, but also to invest in her dressmaking workshop. Marina is therefore applying for a loan in order to buy material, threads and needles, so that she may deliver good quality products. Once this loan has been paid off, Marina wants to continue to apply for loans in order to have the finances to carry out her plans for her business and family.

loans.use: to buy material, threads and needles.

loans.name: Gerson Jhonatan

texts.es:
Gerson es un joven de 22 años de edad, logró cursar un nivel académico hasta bachillerato, luego se acompañó y su pareja se dedica al comercio de ropa, tiene dos hijos los cuales depende económicamente de él y solo uno va a la escuela.

Él trabajaba como empleado en una tienda en la cual estaba como repartidor de cilindros de gas propano, decidió dedicase a esto por la necesidad de salir adelante, él brinda el servicio a todas horas y todos los días a los alrededores de su domicilio.

El crédito lo necesita para ampliar más su negocio pues piensa comprar más cilindros y así distribuir más ya que actualmente con lo que tiene se encuentra a veces limitado para brindar el servicio y pierde la oportunidad de obtener ganancias.

Gerson sueña con tener un negocio grande que le genere estabilidad económica para sacar adelante a sus hijos y que puedan prepararse académicamente y también con las ganancia poder un día no muy lejano construir su casa.
texts.en:
Gerson is a 22-year-old young man.  He managed to complete a high school level of education.  After that, he became involved in a relationship; his partner works selling clothing.  He has two children who are his financial dependents, one of whom goes to school.  He used to work as an employee at a store, where he was a propane gas deliveryman.  He decided to do this work because of his need to get ahead.  

He offers his services at all hours and on all days, in the neighborhoods around his house.

He needs this loan to expand his business because he plans on buying more gas tanks, and in that way to distribute more.  This is because with what he currently has, at times he is limited in offering service and loses an opportunity for earnings.

Gerson dreams of having a large business that gives him financial stability to get his children ahead and allows them to be academically prepared.  He also dreams of a not-so-distant day when he can build a house.

loans.use: to expand his propane distribution business

loans.name: Chizi

texts.en:
Chizi is a married woman with five school-going children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past two years, she has operated a clothes and shoe-selling business. She cites stiff competition as her major challenge in the business. 

Chizi is requesting a loan to purchase bales of clothes and shoes for resale. She joined Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes and shoes for resale.

loans.name: Santos Juan

texts.es: Santos Juan es una persona de 68 años de edad, Casado, viven en el departamento de Sololá, tiene siete hijos, tres varones y cuatro mujeres, todos sus hijos están casados,  la actividad que practica es la agricultura, ha elegido esta actividad debido a que cuenta con terreno para la siembra de maíz, donde obtiene la mayor parte de sus ingresos y que contribuye al sostenimiento de su familia,  está solicitando la cantidad de Q4,000 el cual utilizara para la compra de fertilizante y poder incrementar el rendimiento de su cosecha, su sueño es mejorar e incrementar la producción y que sirva de replica para que otros agricultores aprendan de su experiencia.
texts.en:
Santos Juan is 68 years old. He is married and lives in the department of Sololá. He has seven children, three sons and four daughters. All of his children are married.

He works in the field of agriculture. He chose this activity because he had land where he can grow corn where he earns most of his income and it provides the support for his family.

He is asking for Q4,000 to use for the purchase of fertilizer to be able to increase the yield of his harvest. His dream is to improve and increase production and to serve as a model for other farmers to learn from his experience.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer

loans.name: Isaac Manuel

texts.es:
Isaac  es un joven, soltero, de 23 años de edad, actualmente tiene 1 hijo; y vive junto a su familia en Quiché.
El se dedica a la elaboración de pantalones de lona; esta actividad lo realiza muy cerca de su domicilio (a 300 metros). Tiene 10 años de estar realizando esa labor. Se dedica a esta actividad porque se ha dado cuenta que es algo rentable; los ingresos que obtiene de esta labor cubren los gastos en que incurre para el sostenimiento de su hermosa familia. Comenta que tiene una familia muy unida porque su pareja aporta al presupuesto familiar porque obtiene ingresos de la elaboración y venta de ropa típica.
Isaac está solicitando un préstamo de Q 7,000.00 para la compra de materia prima (telas, hilos, y una máquina de coser) para la elaboración de pantalones.
Su mayor sueño es contar con un local propio y grande para poder mejorar su producción y  ventas e incrementar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Isaac is a young man. At 23 years old, he is single and has one son. Isaac lives with his family in Quiché.

Isaac makes a living producing canvas trousers. He does this work just 300 metres from his house. He has been doing this work for ten years. Isaac does this work because he has realised that it is profitable. The income from this work covers the costs of looking after his beautiful family. Isaac tells us that he has a very close-knit family because his partner also brings in an income from producing and selling traditional clothes.

Isaac is applying for a loan of 7000 Qetzal in order to buy basic supplies (material, threads and a sewing machine) for making trousers.

Isaac's biggest dream is to have his own, large premises in order to improve production and sales, and to increase profits.

loans.use: to buy basic supplies (material, threads and a sewing machine) for making trousers.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es:
Tomás es un señor, soltero, de 40 años de edad, actualmente tiene 4 hijas; vive junto a ellas en Sololá.
El se dedica a la venta de refacciones en forma ambulante; la venta la realiza específicamente en los buses extraurbanos que transitan hacia diferentes puntos del país. Tiene 10 años de estar realizando la actividad, con lo cual genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su familia. Comenta que tiene una familia muy unida porque también le ayuda su pareja en la realización de la venta de las refacciones.
Tomás está solicitando un préstamo de Q 3,000.00 para la compra de materia prima (maíz, carne y otros condimentos) para la venta de comida.
Su mayor sueño es contar con un local fijo para poder mejorar su venta e incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Tomás is a unmarried man, age 40.  He has four children now; he lives with them in Sololá.

He works as a mobile snack vendor.  Specifically, he makes his sales on the buses that travel to different parts of the country.  He has been doing this work for ten years.  It generates the income needed to sustain his family.  He says that he has a very close-knit family because his partner helps him in making his snack sales.

Tomás is asking for a loan of 3,000 quetzales to buy ingredients (corn, meat, condiments) for food sales.

His biggest dream is to have a food stall in order to be able to improve his sales and increase his income.

loans.use: to buy ingredients (corn, meat, condiments) for food sales

loans.name: Ramos

texts.es: Ramos es una persona de 43 años de edad, Unida, viven en el departamento de Sololá, tiene siete hijos, cuatro varones y tres mujeres, la actividad que practica es la artesanía, diseñando y elaborando trajes típicos de la región donde vive, su madre ha contribuido a los conocimientos de la técnica del tejido y que además es una actividad rentable donde obtiene la mayor parte de sus ingresos y así poder sostener a su familia,  está solicitando la cantidad de Q4,300 el cual utilizara para introducir el servicio de energía eléctrica en su vivienda y mejorar las condiciones de su familia en especial la de sus hijos, una de sus metas es poder remodelar y ampliar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Ramos is forty-three years old, is married, and lives in Sololá.  She has seven children, including four boys and three girls.  She is an artisan and works designing and making clothing characteristic to the region where she lives.  She gained this technical knitting knowledge from her mother.  This business is a very profitable activity, and she is able to retain much of her income so that she can provide for her family.  

She is requesting a loan of 4,300 quetzales, which she will use to install electricity in her home.  This will improve the living conditions for her family, especially for her children.  One of her greatest dreams is to be able to remodel and expand her home.

loans.use: to install electricity in her home.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es:
Dolores es un señor, soltero, de 52 años de edad, actualmente tiene 8 hijos (5 varones y 3 mujeres) vive junto a sus hijos menores de edad en Sololá.
El se dedica a cuidar la escuela de su comunidad (conserjería); esta actividad le gusta realizarla  porque le sirve a la escuela y además recibe una remuneración que utiliza para el sostenimiento de su familia. Tiene varios años ya trabajando en dicha escuela. Además de esta labor el tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio, con lo que obtiene otros ingresos que complementan el presupuesto de gastos de su familia.
Dolores está solicitando un préstamo de Q 3,000.00 para la compra de materiales para la construcción de una bodega.
Su mayor sueño es mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y asi brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Dolores is a single 52-year-old man.  He has eight children, including five boys and three girls, and lives together with his younger children in Sololá.  He works as a caretaker of a school in the community.  He likes this work because he is able to serve the school while earning a salary that allows him to sustain his family.  He has been working in this same school for many years. 

In addition to this work he also has a small grocery store that he runs out of his own home.  The income he earns from this work complement his other income and help cover the family's expenses.  

Dolores is requesting a loan of 3,000 quetzales to purchase construction materials so that he may build a small storeroom.  

His greatest dream is to improve the conditions of his home and to thereby offer a greater quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to buy materials to construct a small storeroom.

loans.name: Raquel Group

texts.en:
Gloria is the featured representative of the Raquel group. She and the other group members have been best friends since they left their homes in the Philippines to seek better work opportunities in Lebanon. They came together as a group to acquire a loan from Kiva’s field partner Al Majmoua in order to improve their financial well being.

Gloria is a 49-year-old widowed mother of four. She has been struggling to provide her children with the necessary living needs ever since her husband passed away and  Al Majmoua was her only hope. For this reason her acquired loan will be sent to the Philippines to cover her children's increasing living needs. She misses them a lot and hopes that she will be able to see her loved ones soon. 

Gloria is the sweet woman standing between her friends, Almarie is the woman with the long hair at the right side of the picture, and Raquel is the first from the left.

loans.use: To cover her children's increasing living needs

loans.name: Walther Mauricio

texts.es: Walther padre de familia que con mucho esfuerzos ha logrado brindar los estudios básicos a sus hijos hoy en día ellos trabajan y estudian por su propia cuenta la universidad, walther siempre se dedica al negocio de la fotografía labor que le genera pocos ingresos pero gracias a sus esfuerzos ha sabido mantener sus gastos, solicita el crédito con ánimo de mejorar las condiciones de infraestructura de su hogar como es realizar un cuarto y poder ofrecer a su familia un mejor ambiente y comodidad en el hogar.
texts.en:
Walther is a family man who with great effort has managed to give his children a basic education.  These days his children work and study on their own account in the university.

Walther has always worked as a photographer.  This job brings only a little income, but thanks to his efforts he has known how to keep his expenses in check.  He is asking for this loan with the goal of improving the infrastructure of his home by building a room.  In this way he can offer his family a better environment and more comfort in their home.

loans.use: to buy concrete blocks, cement, sand, and rebar.

loans.name: Siempre Adelante Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SIEMPRE ADELANTE”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Lucila ella es conviviente y tiene 52 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de frutas, la socia vende plátanos, mandarinas, papayas, naranjas y uvas, la socia tiene un puesto de mercado donde vende las frutas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las frutas. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar plátanos, mandarinas, papayas, naranjas y uvas.

Las socias que están pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto después de la reunión porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo. 

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de frutas, negocio de venta de chicha, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de animales.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank "SIEMPRE ADELANTE" ("ALWAYS FORWARD"). This bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the Cusco province in the county of Cusco. 



Lucila is a member, age 52, and she has two children. She works in her fruit-selling business; she sells bananas, tangerines, papayas, oranges, and grapes. She has a stand in the market where she sells the fruit, and she works from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. Lucila has been in this business for seven years already and it is doing very well. This member's dream is to have a location where she can sell her fruit. She requests this loan to buy bananas, tangerines, papayas, oranges, and grapes. 


The members' photo that is attached to the group photo was taken after the meeting because they had to request permission for work reasons. 



The other members work in selling fruit, liquor, or animals, or running grocery stores. 





Lucila appreciates all those who form a part of her dream in this way, and she promises to comply with her payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy bananas, tangerines, papayas, oranges, and grapes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise in order to stock her corner store

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia Luz Marina continua dedicándose al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia lleva años dedicándose a este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta manera seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de gaseosas entre otros .
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Member Luz Marina operates a grocery store. For several years, she has operated this business, which is doing well due to the effort she puts forth every day. She hopes to continue working in order to continue supporting her family. She is applying for the loan to buy soda among other things. She is thankful for the loans she has received and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy soda among other things.

loans.name: Villaluna

texts.en:
Villaluna is a 57-year-old married woman. She settled to earn her living in Misamis Occidental, Philippines together with her five adult children. Over the past two years, Villaluna was able to put up a rice and corn retail store that absolutely met the market's primary demands. The business is still doing well and it provides enough cash flow to cover the family's day-to-day expenditures. She added groceries in her store and gains more returns.

Villaluna joined GDMPC earlier this year to have an easy access to financial services. Her first loan application from the cooperative has been approved. The money taken is intended to obtain additional rice and corn variants to sell. With these in-demand basic commodities, Villaluna expects an increase in sales and will expand her business and improve the general living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to obtain additional rice and corn variants to sell.

loans.name: Artemia

texts.en: Artemia has been operating her own general store, while her husband does farming to make a living. For six years in running the business, Artemia has been able to maintain and sustain her store. She always find many ways to augment their living. To improve sales, Artemia took a new loan to buy  more grocery goods to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to buy more grocery goods to sell.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
This is Lorna. She previously accessed an 11,000 PHP loan that she used to buy more corn and increase her product inventory. Her earnings were a big help in her personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for a 15,000 PHP loan to purchase more stock of corn needed for her business. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Lorna desires to grow her business and dreams of a happy life for her family. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for more corn needed in her business.

loans.name: Jannet

texts.en: Jannet is a thirty six year old female who is married with five children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She is a farmer who mainly grows cocoa and sells to people around her home town. She uses the income collected from cocoa sales to look after her dear family, to cater for their daily expenses and well being. She is a hard working mother who wishes for her children to be in good schools and attain high levels of understanding. Her goal is to expand her cocoa growing business to a larger scale to fetch more profits, although limited capital and unpredictable weather changes affects her plans. Jannet is requesting a loan to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Kipngetich

texts.en:
Meet Kipngetich, a father of one from Kericho, Kenya. Kipngetich has been a mixed farmer for the last six years.  He makes ends meet by selling milk, eggs, and tea produced from his farm. Generating income for the family is his greatest motivator. However, disease outbreaks are his biggest challenge. 

He is passionate about dairy farming: He named his dairy cow Seroi. To pull himself out of poverty, he mobilized a group of farmers and got them to join groups. The groups that joined Juhudi Kilimo were trained and introduced to loans. 

Kipngetich is seeking a loan to construct a dairy unit. He has future plans of introducing zero grazing to improve milk production in his farm. With your loan, Kipngetich will improve the state of his dairy farm. This only serves to generate more money that will go to improving his family's livelihood.

loans.use: to construct a dairy unit.

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a 30-year-old married woman with two children, living with them in Taiz, Yemen. She is an uneducated woman. Her husband is the sole breadwinner of the family. Amal wanted to help her husband in improving the condition of the family. She decided to work as a beautician. She earns good money from this business, but the reality is that it is not enough to cover all the expenses of the family. She says that her house lacks many home appliances, and most of the ones they have are very old. Amal's washing machine can't work well because it is very old. As a result, Amal wants to change it. For this reason, Amal is requesting a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase a new washing machine to replace the current one.

Amal hopes to open a beauty parlor in her area in order to increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase a new washing machine to replace the other one.

loans.name: Ferat

texts.en: Ferat wants to thank all lenders for the previous loan, which enabled him to improve his business of planting and selling various fruits. He used the loan to pay for fences around the area of land where he has planted his orchards. Now, thanks to the increase in his business and added income, he has managed to expand his parcel of land and orchards and is again in need of a loan to purchase additional fences. With this extra land he is going to sell apples that he harvests and is very optimistic that it will be a successful crop. He hopes in the future to continue to acquire more land and add other varieties of fruit. He wants to thank all of the lenders for their continued support.

loans.use: To purchase additional fences

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
Riza is working as a mechanic running his own auto service business. He gained all of his knowledge and experience from his father and has become very well-known and popular in the area. At only 31 years old, he is a hard worker and is very talented, which has led to his success in his career. 

At this time he is requesting a loan in order to purchase new tools for his auto service. This loan will help him to gain more income and secure his financial situation for his future. He hopes that he will be able to further expand his business and even include a car wash. He wants to thank all of the lenders for their support.

loans.use: To purchase new tools for his auto service

loans.name: Filloreta

texts.en:
Filloreta is recently married and has just finished a school to be a hairdresser. She is very enthused about her recent achievements and is planning to start up her own business. Her husband is involved in agriculture and does not make much money, so Filloreta is not able to start up her business through her own financial means and is asking for a loan for the first time. With the loan, she would be able to purchase tools for her business, as well as necessary furniture and equipment.

She is very optimistic that she will be successful because of her passion for her profession, her education, and the fact that she is hard working. Filloreta is very grateful for this opportunity and wants to thank all of the lenders for their support.

loans.use: To purchase tools for her business, as well as necessary furniture and equipment

loans.name: Nazario

texts.es:
El socio continua dedicándose a brindar el servicio de transporte, él socio lleva años dedicándose a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio a la vez continua dedicándose al negocio de compra y venta de madera, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta manera seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro.

El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The borrower continues offering a taxi service, and has been in this business for many years and is doing well thanks to the effort that he puts into his business each day. At the same time he continues buying and selling wood. He wants to be able to continue working as this is the way he supports his family.

He is asking for a loan in order to maintain his car. He feels grateful for the granted loan and agrees to complete his payments as established.

loans.use: to maintain his car that he uses in his taxi service

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for school tuition for her youngest son

loans.name: Rosa Audelia

texts.es: Rosa tiene 44 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 15 años y 12 años de edad. Rosa trabaja en una finca de café cercana a su localidad limpiando y sembrando café. Junto a su compañero de vida quien es albañil mantienen la economía de su hogar. Rosa solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos para hacer el desembolso. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, ladrillo, arena, hierro y pagará mano de obra para la construcción.
texts.en:
Rosa is 44 years old and lives in her own home with her life companion and her two children who are 15 and 12 years old. Rosa works on a coffee farm near her town, cleaning and planting coffee. She and her husband, who is a mason, support the household finances.

Rosa is asking for a loan through FUSAI in order to invest in building a room because she does not have the financial resources to cover the expense. With the requested amount she will buy cement, bricks, sand, iron, and will pay the construction laborers.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, sand, iron, and to pay the construction laborers for building a room

loans.name: Mollecato Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “MOLLECATO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Felicitas ella es soltera y tiene 59 años y tiene 7 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta y crianza de animales, la socia cría los cuyes y gallinas los hace crecer y engordar y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias, por medio de este pequeño negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los cuyes y gallinas. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y gallinas y alimentos para los cuyes y gallinas.

Los socios que están pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto después de la reunión porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de comida, negocio de venta de animales, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de ganados.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank  MOLLECATO. The bank is located in the district of Urcos, part of the Quispicanchis province in the department of Cusco.  One member is Felicitas, age 59. She is single and has seven children. 

Felicitas' main business is raising and selling animals. She raises and fattens guinea pigs and chickens and then sells them in different markets. Through this business, she is able to get her children ahead. Her dream is to have a location where she can sell her guinea pigs and chickens. This particular loan will be used to buy more animals and the feed that they need.

The members shown attached to the group photo had their pictures taken after the meeting; the requested and received permission for work reasons.  The other members are in a variety of businesses, including selling food, selling animals, selling cattle, and running a grocery store.  Felicitas thanks anyone who becomes part of her dream in this way, and she is committed to making her payments with the established time frame.

loans.use: buy guinea pigs, chickens, and feed for her animals.

loans.name: Jelimar

texts.en: Jelimar owns and operates a business providing motorcycle transportation in the local community. He has been doing this for six years and earns a good income for his needs and had successfully repaid his previous loan used for motor accessories. Recently, he took out a new loan to buy new tires in order to replace the old used tires for it, needed to make the services secure. He hopes to provide better living conditions to his entire family in the near future.

loans.use: to buy new tires

loans.name: Mirriam

texts.en:
Mirriam is very thankful for the 25,000 PHP loan assistance extended to her as she was able to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for her children’s education, in their personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another loan, this time 27,000 PHP, which she will utilize to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in better profits. Her profits from the business will definitely help sustain her family’s daily needs and children’s education expenses. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Mirriam hopes continuous gains in profit. She hopes that her family will be always united and free from any danger. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of their lives and business every week.  It is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay their Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en: While her husband works as an overseas Filipino worker, Imelda, who is 42 years old, operates a farm to make a living. In order to cover the costs of improving her farm, she borrowed a loan from GDMPC where she is currently a member. The money taken was used to buy fertilizer. She hopes to have a better harvest this season and to sustain and improve the farm to ensure a better income in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Douglas

texts.en: Douglas is 49 years old and married with 3 children aged 17,15 and 13 years old, respectively. All are still attending school. He is into furniture manufacturing under the Chipinge branch in Zimbabwe. He has been in this business for 9 years and sells his products to the local market. He also earns income from selling maize. His main challenge is lack of raw materials such as timber, chipboard and glue to manufacture more furniture. Douglas requested a loan of $1000 through MicroKing for the purchase of additional raw materials for his furniture making business. He says that the extra income from this loan will help him to purchase additional raw materials which will increase his sales. In the future he would like to purchase a bigger vehicle to ferry his own products to his clients

loans.use: to pay for raw materials

loans.name: Jose Alejandro

texts.es:
José tiene 35 años y vive en una comunidad al norte de Nicaragua, junto a su esposa y sus cinco hijos con edades entre 3 y 11 años. Tres de sus hijos van a la escuela de su comunidad.

Este joven emprendedor se dedica al cultivo de café desde hace más de 15 años, y actualmente lo manejo bajo la certificación de Comercio Justo. Señala que la producción de su café en los últimos 3 años ha pasado de 350 a 450 quintales, y que para este ciclo su meta es continuar incrementando su producción, para lo cual solicita un préstamo que le permita adquirir los fertilizantes que requiere su cafetal.

El sueño de este productor es que sus hijos puedan continuar estudiando, y que si él logró estudiar solo la primaria, sus hijos puedan tener mejores oportunidades para tener una profesión o mayores conocimientos para aplicar en su finca.
texts.en:
José is 35 years old. He lives in a community in northern Nicaragua with his wife and five children between the ages of 3 and 11 years old. Three of his children go to the school in the community. 

This young entrepreneur has grown coffee for more than 15 years and he operates in accordance with Fair Trade regulations. This means that his coffee production throughout the past 3 years has surpassed 350-450 quintales. This season, his goal in to continue increasing his production, so he has applied for a loan that will enable him to obtain the fertilizers that he needs for his coffee crop. 

His dream is that his children can continue studying  since he only went to school through the first grade, so that they can have more opportunities to be professionals or have more knowledge to utilize on the farm,

loans.use: to buy fertilizers required by coffee plants.

loans.name: Albert

texts.en:
Albert is 36 years old and recently married. He just became a father six months ago for the first time. He is a very hardworking man who strives to provide better living conditions for his new and growing family. For his main source of income, he works in an auto wash but has a low salary. 

Albert is requesting a loan so that he can renovate his house and repair the roof. Without the assistance from lenders, he will not be able to complete these repairs, which he sees as necessary to provide a dry, warm and safe environment to raise his family. His goal is to open his own car wash after he has gained enough experience working in his current job. He appreciates the support to help him with his family and life, and thanks all of the lenders.

loans.use: to renovate his house and repair the roof.

loans.name: Lily

texts.en:
Meet Lily, a mother of 4 who has been practising agriculture for the last 3 years. She lives together with her children in the Litein, a countryside in Kenya with expansive tea plantations. She keeps dairy cows and poultry on her farm. She also grows tea and vegetables. Predictably, her primary income sources are derived from selling milk, eggs, tea leaves and vegetables. For extra money, she also offers transportation solutions to other farmers on her Indian motorcycle.

Feeding animals is the activity she enjoys most out of farming. Ironically, transportation of farm produce remains Lily’s biggest challenge.
  
Lily is seeking a loan from Kiva Lenders to construct a cowshed.

Before joining Juhudi, Lily could not access loans from banks because she was considered to be a high risk client. She mobilized a small group of farmers in her village and created a group. Through the group, she joined Juhudi Kilimo and learned about loan management and agribusiness. She also got to learn about KIVA. 

Now, with your loan, Lily will construct a cowshed and later introduce zero grazing to her farm. She is projecting a significant increase in income: enough to enable her to service the loan comfortably. Later on she will channel the money to her children’s education after meeting her loan obligation.

loans.use: to construct a dairy unit.

loans.name: Samon

texts.en:
Samon is 27 years old and a loving mother of one child. She is living with her family in the Bakan district of Pursat province. Samon is an industrious farmer who grows and harvests rice to sell in the local markets of the province. She has been doing this type of business for five years. Her earnings from this business allow her to pay for her daily meals, school allowances for her child, and to cover other costs of commodities. 

Currently, Samon’s family doesn't have a safe latrine to use at home, so she wants to build one to improve their sanitation and personal hygiene. In this regard, she would like to acquire a loan of 750 USD to build a household latrine and buy its accessories. The water loan program offered by HKL, with a special interest rate, has encouraged Samon to focus on healthy living conditions, safeguarding the health of her family, and protecting the environment.

loans.use: to build a safe household latrine.

loans.name: Rosely

texts.es: La Señora Rosely tiene 19 años, ella se dedica a la actividad de la venta de cosméticos y  productos de belleza por catálogo, ella entrega a distintos lugares oficinas y domicilios donde le hacen pedidos,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, solicita el crédito para la compra de cosméticos que se encuentran e promoción al por mayor, la razón para solicitar este préstamo es incrementar su capital de trabajo y así de esta manera mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que esta es la única actividad que le permite mantenerse, la Señora Rosely es una persona joven con ganas de superarse en la vida y con el tiempo poder tener una tienda exclusiva de cosméticos.
texts.en:
Rosely, age 19, is in the business of selling cosmetics and beauty supplies by catalog. She delivers to the various homes and offices where she received orders. This is her first loan from the institution, and she is requesting it to buy some cosmetics that she found on sale at wholesale. The loan will let her expand her working capital, thus improving her family's quality of life. She is happy and grateful to the institution for the support they provide her, since this is her only means of supporting herself.

Rosely is a young person with a strong drive to improve herself in life. In time, she hopes to have an exclusive cosmetics store.

loans.use: buy cosmetics at wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and buy more educational equipment for her son.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es:
La socia Andrea sigue dedicándose al negocio de compra y venta de leche, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales, la socia a la vez continua dedicándose a la agricultura y venta de leña, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia, la socia desea seguir trabajando para continuar apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de leche.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Andrea, an associate, continues working in her business buying and selling milk.  She has been doing this for quite a while now.  Her business brings her both personal and financial benefits.  At the same time, she continues working in agriculture and firewood sales, seeing as how this is how she gets her family ahead.  She hopes to keep working in order to keep supporting her family.

She is asking for this loan to purchase milk.  She is grateful for the loan that was granted, and is committed to making her established payments.

loans.use: to buy milk

loans.name: Ellen

texts.en: Ellen is a 31-year-old married woman who lives in Misamis Occidental with her family. Her husband is a retired serviceman who helps her in managing her retail store to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year, earning enough to increase her savings. She took out a loan from GDMPC microcredit to buy more groceries to sell. She plans to expand her store in order to generate more income for the future of the family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.en: Jesusa owns and manages a farm, planting and harvesting rice for sale and family consumption. In order to buy seedlings and fertilizer, she borrowed a loan from GDMPC where she became a member recently. She hopes to have an abundant harvest in order to generate additional income for the purpose of renovating her house.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer.

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.en:
Jesusa owns and operates a farm, planting and harvesting bananas to sell and earn a living. She's been in business for eight years and it sustains her living. She has successfully repaid her previous loans used for the farm.  

Jesusa plans to use the additional profit generated from the business, to improve and expand her business. Recently, she took a new loan from GDMPC to purchase organic fertilizer in order to gain more return for her family.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en: Delia earns a living by selling goods in her retail store while her husband works as a driver. For three years, Delia has earned well and sustained the business. She has also bought some home improvements, such as appliances. She has had competitors in the village, but she has never worried, for she has her loyal customers who visit her store and make some purchases. To add to inventory, she took out a loan from GDMPC microcredit to buy more grocery items to sell. She hopes to have more earnings in order to generate additional income for the purpose of renovating her house.

loans.use: to buy more grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.en:
Lilibeth previously accessed a 20,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantity and variety of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help with her children’s education and their personal, household and business expenditures. She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profits. Her profits from business will definitely help to sustain her family’s daily needs and her children’s education expenses. She looks forward to this financial improvement with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. Lilibeth hopes to become successful through all her hard work, and she dreams that all her children will be able to finish their studies. She meets with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week, where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies. 

*All CCT community partners /clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Efrain

texts.es:
Efraín es un hombre trabajador, que desde hace 21 años emprendió en el mundo de la agricultura para proveerle a su esposa y a sus 2 hijas a cargo, ya que la tercera es independiente, un futuro estable. A sus 37 años, se levanta todos los días a las 5 am para cuidar de su siembra de frijoles o de maíz.  Desafortunadamente, no tuvo la oportunidad de entrar al colegio por problemas económicos, es por ello que para él es una gratificación poder darles a sus hijas lo que el no pudo tener. 
Don Efrain había obtenido un préstamo KIVA anteriormente, del cual se siente muy agradecido, pues con este pudo crecer un poco más, ya que compro semilla del frijol y el abono que utilizaría en esa siembra. Sin embargo desea seguir creciendo, por esta razón ahora solicita un préstamo para comprar abono, semilla de frijol, y para poder pagarles a sus trabajadores en este ciclo de primavera donde se necesita muchas manos. Esto le ayudara a retener un maíz que había cultivado antes y venderlo cuando este a mejor precio. Como su meta es seguir creciendo al cancelar este préstamo piensa comprar unas vaquillas para entrar en la ganadería.
texts.en:
Efraín is a hard-working man who has been in the business of agriculture for 21 years. It lets him provide a stable future for his wife and the two daughters who are still in his care, now that the third one is independent. Now 37 years old, he gets up at 5:00am every day to care for his bean and corn crops.

He himself was never able to pursue higher education due to economic difficulties, which is why it's been a pleasure for him to provide his daughters with what he could not have.

Efraín has received a loan from Kiva before, and he is very thankful since it let him grow a little more by buying bean seed and the fertilizer he will use for this planting. But he still wants to keep growing, so he is requesting this loan to buy fertilizer and bean seed, and then later to pay for the manual labor during the spring season, when he needs a lot of hands. This will help him retain a corn crop he had planted before and sell it at a better price. Since his goal is to keep growing and pay off his debt, he is also thinking of buying some heifers and getting into raising cattle.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and seed and pay for manual labor.

loans.name: Fordus

texts.en: Fordus is a 25-year-old married woman who lives with her spouse in Taiz City, Yemen. She has a university education. Recently, she became an employee in a private clinic. She assists her husband with most of the family's expenses. The money that she receives from her job is not enough to cover all the expenses of the family. Fordus's house lacks many home appliances and furniture. Unfortunately, the income of Fordus and her husband is not enough to furnish the house. For this reason, Fordus is applying for a loan of 90,000 YER from AMB in order to buy new furniture for the house. Fordus looks forward to improving the condition of her family. She hopes to provide her family with a lot of money.

loans.use: to purchase new furniture for the house.

loans.name: Jorge Mauricio

texts.es:
Jorge de 43 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado de educación. Esta acompañado su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos del hogar,  tienen ellos en común 3 hijos todos viven con ellos en casa y estudian nivel básico.


Jorge se dedica a la agricultura por más de 20 años,  ya que desde pequeño le enseño la actividad el padre pues ha sido una familia que se ha dedicado a eso para salir adelante. Jorge tiene otras actividades económicas, como al jornal en las temporadas que no está trabajando la agricultura,   a la crianza y comercialización de reces y la venta de leche y queso. Pero a la actividad que más se dedica es la agricultura, el lugar de trabajo del cliente está muy cerca de su casa,  por lo que no le cuesta llegar, el horario de trabajo de es de 6 horas al día. 


El préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar abonos, fertilizantes, herbicidas, foliares, entre otros productos necesarios para cultivar el maíz y el maicillo que desea sembrar. El préstamo mejora sus ingresos a través de la venta de los granos y podrá  cultivar a tiempo para asegurar también la alimentación de su familia.

Los sueños del cliente son seguir trabajando en lo que le gusta y es la agricultura, pues ha sido el pilar que le ha permitido sacar a delante a su familia y que sus hijos estén estudiando.

Para su familia sueña con que sus hijos estudien, lo que él no pudo estudiar y de alguna forma trabajen de forma diferente a la de él. Ya que la agricultura es una actividad bastante pesada.
texts.en:
Jorge is 43 years old. He studied through the sixth grade. He lives with his wife, who works as a housewife. They have three children who live with them and study in the primary school.

Jorge has worked in agriculture for more than 20 years. His father taught him the trade when he was young as his family worked in agriculture in order to move forward. Jorge has other jobs such as daily wage work in seasons when he is not working on his farm, raising and selling cattle, and selling milk and cheese. He mostly focuses on agriculture however. He works near his house, so it is not difficult to arrive. He works for 6 hours per day. 

The loan that he is applying for from CREDICAMPO is to to buy manure, fertilizer, herbicides,and liquid plant food among other products necessary to grow the corn and sorghum that he wishes to plant. The loan will increase his income through the sale of the grains and he will be able to harvest on time in order to ensure that there is food for his family. 

The client dreams of continuing to work in agriculture, which he likes. It has enabled his to move forward with his family and allowed his children to go to school. For his family, he hopes that his children go to school since he couldn't go to school and that they work in a different trade since farming is difficult work.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, herbicides,and liquid plant food among other products necessary to grow the corn and sorghum that he wishes to plant.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Hello world! Meet Betty. For the last two years, Betty has been farming on a small piece of land in Litein, a small rural town in Kenya. She earns an income by selling milk, eggs, tea and vegetables produced on her farm. Betty is always enthusiastic and joyful when selling her farm produce. Weeding crops, however, is the part she enjoys least. 

Betty is seeking a loan to purchase a good quality dairy cow. Traditionally, cows were kept for cultural purposes. Ironically, the cattle keepers were languishing in abject poverty. After Betty attended a dairy farm training, she had a change of perspective and made up her mind to commercialize her operations and focus on milk sales. 

With your lending, Betty will purchase a dairy cow she has already identified that produces 15 to 20 liters of milk per day. This amount of milk will generate enough income to enable her to repay loan installments and keep the surplus for farm-related expenses. With growth in income, Betty will be able to create wealth and give her family a better life.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Elíseo

texts.es:
Elíseo de 41 años de edad,  vive con su hijo de 2 años de edad y con su esposa quien se dedica a los oficios del hogar, Elíseo solo estudio hasta 5 grado, luego se dedicó totalmente a la agricultura, aunque aprendió el oficio de albañilería para tener otra fuente de ingresos.

Elíseo es un hombre trabajador y dedicado totalmente a su familia, se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 10 años, trabajando al lado de su padre que fue quien le enseño a cultivar la tierra, aparte de cultivar la tierra, Elíseo sabe trabajar de albañil y eso le ayuda a mejorar sus ingresos. Actualmente  está trabajando en el proyecto del Ministerio de Obras Públicas.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar 2 quintales de urea, 3 quintales de sulfato y una caneca de gramoxone, para fertilizar y limpiar el maíz en su primera y segunda etapa, con esta productos podrá darle un buen manejo al cultivo mejorando su producción y así poder tener más ingresos y también sacar sus granos básicos para darles una buena alimentación a sus hijos. 

Eliseo en un futuro quiere construir una casa nueva para que sus hijos tengan un lugar más sano donde divertirse y sus futuras generaciones tengan mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elíseo, age 41, lives with his two-year-old son and his wife, who is a stay-at-home mother. Elíseo only stayed in school through the fifth grade, when he devoted himself full-time to farming. He has also learned to work as a bricklayer as an additional source of income.  Elíseo is a hard-working family man who has been a farmer since he was 10 years old, working alongside his father, who taught him the trade.  He is currently working on a project for the Ministry of Public Works

With this loan that he is requesting from CREDICAMPO, he plans to buy 2 quintals of urea (a quintal is about 100kg), 3 quintals of sulfate, and a bottle of Gramoxone, an herbicide. He will use this to fertilize and clean his corn crop through its first and second stages. These products will enable him to manage his crop, improving its production and later, his income from the crop. He will also use the staple grains to provide good nutrition for his children.

In the future, Elíseo wants to build a new house so that his children will have a healthier place to play and future generations will have a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy supplies to fertilize and clean his corn crop

loans.name: Josefina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Josefina de 46 años de edad, es casada y madre de 4 hijos.  Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y vive solo con su esposo y tres nietos.


Ella se dedica a los oficios domésticos y cuando puede ayuda a su esposo con la siembra y todo referente a la agricultura. Ya tiene bastante tiempo de estarse dedicando a esto, ella dice que gracias a Dios todos estos años les a ido bien, han sacado para la comidita de la temporada y para vender y pagar el préstamo, el terreno donde ellos cultivan le queda a unos 20 minutos de su casa y viajan caminando, su esposo es la cabeza del hogar y ella le colabora a él,  los horarios son de 6:00 am hasta las 12:00 md.


El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar 6 sacos de abono, un litro de foliar, 2 sacos de sulfato y otros insumos que también se utilizan para la siembra de maíz.  Con este préstamo ella se sentirá muy agradecida porque necesita el préstamo,  ya que no tiene otras opciones para obtener estos insumos y poder dar inicio a la siembra que confiando en Dios dice que van a sacar lo necesario.

Sus sueños son tener buena salud para seguir apoyando a su esposo en la siembra de maíz y frijol, para que tengan para el año de donde sacar para la comida de sus nietos, ya que son tres los que tiene a cargo por los que debe trabajar, pero confía que un día los vera grandes y con un buen futuro para que ellos se sepan defender por si solos.
texts.en:
Josefina is 46 years old. She is married and the mother of 4 children. Her husband works in agriculture. She lives alone with her husband and three grandchildren. She does the domestic chores and when she can she helps her husband with planting and everything pertaining to farming. She has been doing this for some time and she says that thanks to God all has gone well all these years, putting seasonal food on the table and to sell and to repay the loan. The land they farm is some 20 minutes from her home and they walk it. Her husband is the head of the household and she works with him, from the hours of 6:00 AM until noon.

She is asking for a loan from CrediCampo in order to buy 6 bags of fertilizer, a liter of foliar, 2 bags of sulfate and other supplies that they also need to use for planting corn. She feels very grateful for this loan because she needs it as she has no other options to buy these supplies to be able to begin planting and trusting in God she says they are going to do what is necessary.

Her dreams are to have good health so she can continue helping her husband growing corn and beans, so they can have food for the year for her grandchildren as she has three under her care for which she needs to work, but she hopes that one day they will grow up and have a good future so they can get along on their own.

loans.use: to buy 6 bags of fertilizer, a liter of foliar, 2 bags of sulfate and other supplies that she also needs to grow corn

loans.name: David Antonio

texts.es:
David tiene 37 años de edad, sus padres solamente pudieron darle hasta noveno grado. Está casado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tienen tres hijos en común, dos de ellos van a la escuela y el más pequeño aun no asiste.

Él  se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 26 años, su padre fue quien le enseño es una cultura que en su comunidad lo hacen y de eso ellos sobreviven, ha sido un hombre responsable que sabe de su compromiso como padre y esposo, el trabajo lo tiene cerca de su casa, el recorrido lo hace a pie, nadie más se dedica a la actividad, y su horario de trabajo es de 6:00 am a 11:00 am.


El préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar abono, fertilizantes, herbicidas, foliar y semilla,  entre otros, para cultivar 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz.  Con este préstamo,  está asegurando la alimentación de su familia para la temporada del año.

Los sueños son tener su propio negocio donde pueda vender los productos que cultiva,  para su familia desea que ellos cumplan sus sueños y logren sus objetivos espera para sus hijos sean personas de bien y enseñarles a trabajar.
texts.en:
David is 37 years old; his parents could only give him an education through ninth grade.  He is married,and his wife works at household work.  They have three children together; two of them go to school and the smallest does not yet attend school.

He has learned a living in farming for 26 years.  His father taught him how to do this.  This is a customary way of living in his community, and they depend on it for a living.  He has been a responsible man who knows his obligations as husband and father.  He works near his house, getting there on foot. No one else works with him, and his schedule of work is from 6 AM till 11 AM.

The loan he is seeking from CREDICAMPO is for the purpose of buying manure, fertilizers, herbicides, foliar spray and seeds, among other products, to cultivate 7,000 square meters of corn.  By means of this loan he can ensure provision of food for his family throughout the time of the year.

His dreams are to have his own business where he can sell the crops he plants, and for his family that they fulfill their dreams and achieve their aims.  He hopes that his children will be good people and hopes to teach them to work.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers, herbicides, foliar spray and seeds, among other products, to cultivate 7,000 square meters of corn

loans.name: Alex

texts.es: El joven Alex tiene 27 años,  estudia la carrera  de licenciatura informática en una de las universidades reconocidas  de  la Ciudad de La Paz,  el joven Alex trabaja para pagar sus estudios tiene una tienda de barrio donde ofrece variedad de productos de primera necesidad,  este es su primer crédito con la institución y  el joven Alex va a usar este préstamo para  el pago de sus mensualidades,  Alex enfrenta retos en su estudios que son Su trabajo no le permite dedicarse completamente a sus  estudio, pero el joven tiene ganas de continuar y seguir adelante, su deseo cuando termine sus estudios es Quiere ejercer su profesión, ayudar a sus hermanos y mama a mejorar su calidad de vida y con el tiempo poder tener una especialidad en su área como también seguir con su negocio para tener un ingreso extra.
texts.en:
Alex is a 27 year old young man.  He is studying for a degree in computer science in one of the well-known universities in the city of La Paz.  Alex works to pay for his education.  He has a neighborhood store where he sells a variety of basic needs products.

This is his first loan with the institution.  Alex will use this loan to make his monthly payments.  Alex faces challenges in his studies.  His work does not allow him to devote himself full time to his studies.  However, this young man has the desire to continue and to get ahead.  

His wish is to complete his education.  He wants to exercise his profession; to help his siblings and his mother improve their quality of life; and, in time, be able to have a specialty in his area.  He also wants to continue with his business in order to have an extra income.

loans.use: to make his monthly payments.

loans.name: Ismael Antonio

texts.es: Ismael tiene 38 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos de 15 años, 17 años y 12 años de edad. Ismael se dedica a la prestación de servicios de seguridad en una empresa cercana a su localidad dese hace mucho tiempo. Ismael es un hombre muy trabajador y responsable quien desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra del material necesario (lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos ) para reparar el techo de vivienda y de la cocina dado que se encuentra deteriorado.
texts.en:
Ismael, age 38, lives in his own house with his wife and their three children; ages 15, 17, and 12.  Ismael provides security services to a company close to his area.  He has been doing this for a long time.  Ismael is a very hard-working and responsible man who wishes to improve the condition of his house.

Therefore, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy the material needed (galvanized metal sheeting, wood, and nails) to repair the roof of his house and the kitchen because it is rundown.

loans.use: to galvanized metal sheeting, wood, and nails to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en: Judith provides for the needs of her family by raising pigs to earn a living. Aside from this, she also grows vegetables in her garden to earn extra income. She needs capital to improve her business. Without hesitation, she borrowed a loan from GDMPC microfinance to buy feed in order to improve her pigs. Her future plan is to build a pig shelter where she can keep pigs to raise and thereby expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed in order to improve her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more books and school materials for her oldest child

loans.name: Mizraim

texts.en:
Mizraim is a hard-working mom who makes a living with her own farm, a rice farm where she earns money well while her husband works with her.

Mizraim  has been farming since twenty years ago. She starts work early in the morning. She borrowed a new loan from GDMPC microcredit to buy  fertilizer to enhance the farm. Rest assured that she will have a better future, for she is determined to have it.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Nohemy De La Paz

texts.es:
Nohemy  de 22 años de edad, tiene un año de egresado de la universidad nacional, de  licenciatura en ciencias jurídicas, ella actualmente está haciendo su servicio social, es soltera, y vive con su abuela, y  ella es la que depende de ella.

Ella tiene 6 años de dedicarse al trabajo de compra y venta de ropa, actualmente su negocio se lo atiende su tía y el fin de semana lo atiende ella. 

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar ropa femenina y masculina, de toda talla, para todas las edades,  ella comprara 12 pacas de  ropa y pagarle a su tía quien le atiende el negocio.

La cliente a futuro desea tener un negocio estable que le permita obtener ingresos diariamente, y así poder dar  trabajo a su tía.
texts.en:
Nohemy is 22 years old. She graduated one year ago from the National University with a degree in Juridical Sciences, and is currently doing community service. She is single and lives with her grandmother who is dependent on her. 

She has been buying and selling clothes for six years. Her business is currently looked after by her aunt during the week and by Nohemy during the weekend. 

The loan she is requesting is to buy clothes of all sizes for men and women of all ages. She will buy 12 bales of clothes and pay her aunt who looks after the business.

Nohemy wishes to have a stable business that will allow her to obtain daily revenue, so she can provide work to her aunt.

loans.use: to buy clothes of all sizes for men and women of all ages. She will buy 12 bales of clothes and pay her aunt who looks after the business.

loans.name: Marcos

texts.es: Marcos es una persona de 41 años de edad, Unido, quien tiene cuatro hijos,  tres varones y una mujer quienes viven en el departamento de Sololá.El se dedica a la producción y comercialización de hortalizas de ciclo corto en especial el cultivo de cebolla, es una actividad muy rentable en el municipio donde vive, la venta lo realiza en la central de mayoreo en la ciudad de Guatemala, eligió esta actividad debido a que se obtiene ganancias a corto plazo y con esto ayudar al sostenimiento de su familia. El está solicitando un préstamo de Q 10,000.00 para comercializar su producción a nivel nacional.El sueño que tiene es construir una habitación amplia para sus hijos
texts.en: Marcos is 41 years old. He is married and has four children, 3 boys and one girl. They all live in the department of Solola. He makes a living growing and selling vegetables, especially onions. It is a profitable business in the city where he lives because he is able to sell his crops at a central market in Guatemala City. He chose this career because it makes enough money in the short term to support his family. He is asking for a loan of $1,300 to help him sell his product to a wider market. His dream is to be able to build a large bedroom for his children.

loans.use: purchase and sell vegetables, especially onions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy fertilizer, herbicides, and a new pump

loans.name: Noemi Magdalena

texts.es:
Noemi de 25 años de edad,  solo estudio hasta 5º grado, esta acompañada, su pareja   trabaja de motorista, viven en casa familiar, dos hijos estudian.


Ella trabaja cuidando dos niños, de esa forma se gana la vida y le ayuda a su esposo para darles lo que necesitan sus hijos, el trabajo le queda cerca entra de 6:00 AM a 5:00 PM.

 El préstamo lo utilizara para reparar su vivienda y comprara materiales como:cemento,arena, hierro etc, ya que se moja mucho.  De esa forma su familia estará mejor protegida.

El objetivo de Noemi es mejorar cada día su vivienda y que sus hijos tengan una mejor vida,y eso lo lograra con junto con la institución.
texts.en:
Noemi is 25 years old. She studied up to the 5th grade and is married. Her husband works as a driver. They live in a family home and their two children attend school. 

She works in childcare services. This is how she makes a living and is able to help her husband give their children all that they need. She works from around 6am to 5pm. 

The loan will be used to repair her home and to purchase materials such as cement, sand, iron etc because the house has been drenched. By making repairs, her family will be better protected. 

Noemi's goal is to improve her home so that her children have a better life and she will be able to do this with the help of micro-loans.

loans.use: purchase cement, sand, iron etc.

loans.name: Esperanza Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña Esperanza es una persona esforzada, ha luchada por darles lo mejor a su familia a pesar de ser  madre soltera a sus hijos les ha dado estudio y no les ha faltado el pan de cada día, ella ha venido realizando mejoras a su vivienda pero aún le quedan por hacer, pues con su salario que obtiene como secretaria no le ajusta para hacer sus proyectos de un solo en su vivienda.  Solicita crédito para construir un cuarto de 4 x 4, pegado a la pared que construyo recientemente para ello necesita comprar Cemento, Piedras Canteras, Arenilla, Piedrín Hierro entre otros materiales de Construcción y así contar con mayor comodidad en su hogar. El cuarto que construirá lo destinara para su hija que va creciendo y necesita mayor privacidad.
texts.en:
Esperanza is a courageous person.  She has struggled to give her family the best.  In spite of being a single mother, she has given her children an education and their daily sustenance.

She has been making improvements to her house.  However, there is still more left to do.  On her secretary’s salary there is not enough to do her projects on the house all at once.

She is requesting a loan to build a 4 x 4 room attached to the wall that she recently built.  In order to do so she needs to buy cement, quarry stone, grit, gravel, and iron, among other construction materials.  This way her household will be more comfortable.  The room that she will build is for her daughter who is growing and needs more privacy.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Llinset Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Llinseth es habitante de una zona con pobladores de escasos recursos económicos, gracias a su labor como cajera y encargada de compras en una tienda doña Llinseth mantiene los gastos de su hogar en conjunto con el apoyo de su esposo, de esta manera ayudan a sus hijos a salir adelante con sus estudios, solicita el crédito para realizar un baño al interior de su vivienda ya que el que tienen no presta las condiciones sanitarias para vivir en un ambiente limpio y sano.
texts.en: Doña Llinseth lives in a low income area.  Thanks to her work as a cashier and shop assistant at a store, Llinseth covers her household expenses along with the help of her husband.  In this way they support their children with their education.  She is requesting a loan to build a bathroom inside her home, as the one they have doesn't provide for sanitary conditions in order to live in a clean and healthy environment.

loans.use: to purchase cement blocks, cement, sand, iron, a toilet, and accessories.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for agricultural supplies to assist and maintain her coffee crop

loans.name: Leoncio Hugo

texts.es: El señor Leoncio  tiene 59 años, casado y dos hijos ya mayores de las edades de 25 y 23 años,  se dedica  a la venta de variedad de artículos de librería como también al servicio de fotocopias y anillados encuadernaciones, en su  tienda  que se encuentran ubicado  en la zona de Villa Fátima  de la ciudad de la Paz,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  El señor Leoncio  va a usar este préstamo para a la compra de mercadería para surtir su negocio como variedad de material de escritorio como también regalos para su bazar,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es necesidad de surtir su tienda  ya que esta época tiene mucha demanda, El señor Leoncio  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que en la zona hay muchas tiendas bazar, el va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando mercadería y así incrementar su capital y poder tener un almacén donde pueda ofrecer no solo fotocopias y material de escritorio si no también un café internet también  ya que este es uno deseos, se siente feliz y agradecido por esta oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en: Mr. Leoncio  is 59 years old, married, and the father of two children who are now adults at ages 25 and 23. He makes a living selling a variety of office supplies and also provides photocopy services as well as spiral bound notebooks. His store is located in the Villa Fatima zone in the city of La Paz. This loan will his second with this loaning institution. Mr. Leonico will use the loan to purchase merchandise to stock his store, such as purchasing a variety of writing materials but also gift shop items. He is asking for this loan because he needs to supply his store in the current period of high demand. Mr. Leonico has faced challenges in his business, such as competition, because there are many stores in his area. He is going to use his profits to continue purchasing supplies and increase his working capital so that he can offer not only photocopies and writing materials but also expand his store into an internet cafe. This is one of his aspirations and he is happy and thankful for the opportunity given him here.

loans.use: purchase writing materials and gift shop supplies.

loans.name: Selene

texts.es:
La socia Selene continua dedicándose al negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes, gallinas entre otros, la socia cría estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia a la vez continua dedicándose a la compra y venta de leche, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de cuyes para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Selene is still raising small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens, among others.  She raises animals and later sells them to customers.  She also buys and sells milk.  She wants to continue working in order to continue supporting her family.  She is requesting this loan to buy guinea pigs for her business.  She is thankful for the loan and promises to make her payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs for her business.

loans.name: Betty

texts.es: La señora Betty tiene 23 años, casada tiene un hijo pequeños de 1 añito, ella se dedica  a la elaboración y venta de hamburguesas y salchipapas desde hace mucho tiempo, vende  en su puesto de venta que se encuentra  que se encuentran ubicado en su mismo domicilio que es en la Zona de Villa Ingenio,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  La señora Betty va a usar este préstamo para la compra de insumos para la elaboración de hamburguesas como aceite y papa al por mayor,  La señora Betty enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que por la zona  hay muchas pensiones que se dedican a la venta de comida rápida ya que es una zona comercial, ella va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando insumos para preparar sus riquísimas hamburguesas y salchipapas ,  se siente feliz y agradecida por esta oportunidad que le brindan en permitirle hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Mrs. Betty is a 23-year-old married woman with a small 1-year-old child. She has been making and selling hamburgers and fried potatoes with hot dogs for a long time. She works in her stall located in the same area as her home in the district of Villa Ingenio. 

This loan is her first with the institution. Mrs. Betty will use this loan to buy wholesale supplies such as oil and potatoes to make hamburgers. Mrs. Betty faces many competitive challenges as her business is located in a commercial area that has many fast food stalls. She will use the profits to continue to buy supplies to prepare her tasty burgers and fried potatoes with hot dogs. She is grateful and happy for this opportunity that will allow her to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making hotdogs and fried potatoes

loans.name: Napoleon

texts.en:
Napoleon is married and earns a living from his farm in their village. For twenty years, he has earned well to provide for his family needs. He borrowed a loan from GDMPC micro credit to purchase fertilizer and seeds. In the future, he wants to improve his farm to ensure a better source of income for the family.
